content: http://hl7.org/fhir/valueset-timezones.html -> Error from server: Unable to provide support for code system https://www.iana.org/time-zones
I think there is an open tracker on this ... I proposed a common set of tz. just like we did for languages lemmee see its status....

Is the codeSystem https://www.iana.org/time-zones available on http://tx.fhir.org/ ?
(can it be included for STU3 and R4, please, @Grahame Grieve )

Or should IANA put this CodeSystem on registry.fhir.org ?

Our root question is - how to feed this CodeSystem into the HL7 Validator - when using it in our profiles....

image.png

Current gap-filler is to create an NPM package folder locally, from the https://www.iana.org/time-zones files, and include that as a folder dependency in HL7 Validator
